HTML.quote: <!DOCTYPE html> - The backbone of web content structuring and semantics.

CSS.quote: selector { property: value; } - Styling and visual presentation of web pages.

JavaScript.quote: const app = () => {} - Client-side programming and interactivity.

Frontend Frameworks.quote: React, Vue, Angular - Building user interfaces with component architecture.

Backend Development.quote: Node.js, Python, PHP - Server-side logic and application processing.

Database Management.quote: SQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL - Data storage and retrieval systems.

API Development.quote: REST, GraphQL - Interfaces for client-server communication.

Version Control.quote: git commit -m 'feature' - Code management and collaboration.

Web Security.quote: HTTPS, OAuth, JWT - Protecting applications and user data.

Responsive Design.quote: @media screen {} - Adapting layouts to different screen sizes.

Web Performance.quote: Lazy loading, caching, optimization - Speed and efficiency improvements.

Testing.quote: Unit, Integration, E2E - Ensuring code quality and functionality.

DevOps.quote: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes - Development operations and deployment.

Web Accessibility.quote: ARIA, semantic HTML - Making web content accessible to all users.

State Management.quote: Redux, Vuex - Managing application data flow.

Browser APIs.quote: DOM, localStorage, fetch - Interfacing with browser capabilities.

Build Tools.quote: Webpack, Vite, Babel - Code compilation and bundling.

Cross-Browser Compatibility.quote: Feature detection, polyfills - Supporting multiple browsers.

Web Components.quote: Custom elements, shadow DOM - Reusable component architecture.

Deployment.quote: AWS, Vercel, Netlify - Hosting and serving applications.

Mobile Development.quote: Progressive Web Apps, React Native - Mobile-focused web solutions.

Documentation.quote: JSDoc, Swagger - Code and API documentation.

Web Analytics.quote: Google Analytics, user tracking - Measuring site performance.

Content Management.quote: WordPress, Headless CMS - Managing digital content.
